data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Hassan, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hassan, Karnataka, India

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Hassan, Karnataka, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Hassan, Karnataka, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Hassan to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Chingathanar people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Hassan, Karnataka, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Hassan, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Hassan an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Hassan
location.cities_list: Hassan, Arsikere, Channarāyapatna, Hole Narsipur, Sakleshpur
